name: Vocaless
storyline: Karu is a famous singer from Solar City who created a band called "Too" with some of her classmates, back when she was still in university. During one of their concerts, someone stole Karu's voice using a magic spell! Karu, along with the other members of her band, must find whoever is responsible for stealing her voice and force them to give it back!
summary: Vocaless is a unique platformer game with rhythm elements, you must perform all of your actions to the beat! Not only that, but everything in the game, from enemies to obstacles, follows the beat of the music.
